augmentedStrong.references: Matt.13.55 Mark.6.3 Luke.24.10 Acts.12.17 Acts.15.13 Acts.21.18 1Cor.15.7 Gal.1.19 Gal.2.12 Gal.2.9 Jas.1.1 Jude.1.1

vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰάκωβος, -ου, ὁ (Heb., see previous word)
James;
__1. Son of Zebedee: Mat.4:21, Mrk.1:19, 29, Act.1:13 12:2, al.
__2. Son of Alphæus: Mat.10:3, Mrk.2:14, al.; commonly identified with Ἰ. ὁ μικρός, James the little, son of Mary (see: Μαρία, 3; Κλωπᾶς), Mat.27:56, Mrk.15:40 16:1 (cf. Jhn.19:25).
__3. The Lord's brother (see: ἀδελφός): Mat.13:55, Mrk.6:3, Act.12:17, al., 1Co.15:7 (probably), Gal.1:19 2:9, 12, Jas.1:1, Ju 1.
__4. The father of the apostle, Ἰούδας Ἰακώβου: Luk.6:16, Act.1:13
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.shortDef: James, "follower, replacer, one who follows the heel"
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.4.21;
son of: Zebedee (G2199);
brother of: John (G2491H)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Jacobo: (1) hermano de Juan, hijo de Zebedeo ; (2) hermano de Jesús (Santiago); (3) hijo de Alfeo y uno de los doce ; (4) padre de Judas (LUC.6:16; HCH.1:13) ; (5) cobrador de impuestos (MAR.2:14)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅各 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "取代者"
1) 一位使徒, 是西庇太的兒子, 使徒約翰的兄弟
一般稱為"大雅各",被希律殺害 (使徒行傳12章)
2) 一位使徒, 是亞勒腓的兒子,又被稱為"小雅各"
3) 耶穌的兄弟
4) 使徒猶大的父親
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅各这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是"取代者"
1) 一位使徒, 是西庇太的儿子, 使徒约翰的兄弟
一般称为"大雅各",被希律杀害(使徒行传12章)
2) 一位使徒, 是亚勒腓的儿子,又被称为"小雅各"
3) 耶稣的兄弟
4) 使徒犹大的父亲

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.10.3;
son of: Alphaeus (G0256);
brother of: Judas (G2455)

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.13.55;
son of: Joseph (G2501) and Mary (G3137);
brother of: Jesus (G2424), Joseph (G2500), Simon (G4613H) and Jude (G2455I)

A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.27.56; his mother was Mary (G3137H);
brother of: Joseph (G2501H) and Salome (G4539)
